name: Peach Pie with Sour Cream
author: gent500
summary: This is my favorite pie recipe anywhere. Just make sure you use only fresh, high-quality sweet peaches.
ingredients: ½ cup butter, cut into chunks
4  fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place 1 1/4 cups flour, butter, salt, and 2 tablespoons sour cream in a food processor; pulse until mixture comes together in a large ball
Press dough into prepared pie dish to form a crust
Bake in preheated hoven until golden brown, about 10 minutes
Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange peach slices in pie crust
Lightly beat egg yolks in a large bowl
Add in sugar, 1/3 cup sour cream, and 2 tablespoons flour; stir until well-mixed
Bake in preheated oven for 50 minutes; remove foil
Continue baking until peach filling is set, about 15 minutes more
